summary: A simple mod that preventing you from eye strain based on the 20-20-20 rule.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][color=#ffff00][size=6]Take Care of Your Eyes[/size][/color][/b]
[size=3]
A simple mod that preventing you from eye strain based on the 20-20-20 rule.[/size]

[size=3][line][/size]
[color=#ffff00][size=5][b]What is the purpose of this mod?[/b][/size][/color]

[size=3]The 20-20-20 rule says that every 20 minutes of screen time, you should look away at something at least 20 feet away for at least 20 seconds. These regular screen breaks give your eyes some much-needed rest and help prevent eye strain.

[/size][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/81175-2-1483077327.jpg[/img]
More information: [url=http://www.nceyes.org/digital-eye-strain]http://www.nceyes.org/digital-eye-strain[/url]

[line]
[size=5][b][color=#ffff00]What does this mod do?[/color]
[/b][/size]
[size=3]Remind you every 20 minutes to take a break.

[/size][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/81175-3-1483077327.jpg[/img]

[size=3]

[color=#ff7700][b]New feature[/b][/color]: You can turn on/off notification with TakeCare Book. Very simple.
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/81175-0-1483077327.jpg[/img]

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/81175-1-1483077327.jpg[/img]
[/size]
[line]
[size=5][color=#ffff00][b]Installation[/b][/color]
[/size]
[size=3]Simply install with mod manager. This mod will work automatically.[/size]

[size=3][line][/size]

[color=#ffff00][size=5][b]Compatibility[/b][/size][/color]

[size=3]Compatible with everything.[/size]

[line]
[color=#ffff00][size=5][b]Thank you[/b][/size][/color]
[size=3]
[/size][size=3][url=https://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/10803318-masterofnet/]Masterofnet[/url] for a helpful answer in the Nexus forum.

[line][/size][/center]
author: azzendix

files.name: Take Care of Your Eyes
files.changelogHtml: Initial version for Original Skyrim. Ported from SSE version.
